data.title: Saudi Arabia’s annual inflation rate holds steady at 2.3% in April: GASTAT
data.description:
RIYADH: Rent increases and fuel price rises helped Saudi Arabia post an inflation rate of 2.3 percent in April — the same level as a year earlier — official data showed.

	According to the latest figures from the General Authority for Statistics, a 6.8 percent increase in the cost of housing, water, electricity, gas, and other fuels contributed to the rise.

	Within this category, rents paid for housing rose by 8.1 percent, driven by an 11.9 percent spike in apartment rental prices, a category that holds significant weight in the overall index.
data.translatedTitle: Saudi Arabia’s annual inflation rate holds steady at 2.3% in April: GASTAT
data.translatedDescription:
RIYADH: Rent increases and fuel price rises helped Saudi Arabia post an inflation rate of 2.3 percent in April — the same level as a year earlier — official data showed.

	According to the latest figures from the General Authority for Statistics, a 6.8 percent increase in the cost of housing, water, electricity, gas, and other fuels contributed to the rise.

	Within this category, rents paid for housing rose by 8.1 percent, driven by an 11.9 percent spike in apartment rental prices, a category that holds significant weight in the overall index.

data.title: Haaland eyes FA Cup to save face after Man City’s ‘horrific’ season
data.description:
MANCHESTER: Erling Haaland said Manchester City must deliver in the FA Cup final on Saturday to salvage something from a “horrific” season that saw them deposed as English champions for the first time in five years.
	City face Crystal Palace at Wembley aiming to avoid a first trophyless campaign since Pep Guardiola’s debut season in charge in 2016/17.
	Guardiola’s men sit fourth in the Premier League, 18 points adrift of champions Liverpool, and in a battle just to secure a top-five finish and Champions League football next season in their final two league matches.
data.translatedTitle: Haaland eyes FA Cup to save face after Man City’s ‘horrific’ season

	Guardiola’s men sit fourth in the Premier League, 18 points adrift of champions Liverpool, and in a battle just to secure a top-five finish and Champions League football next season in their final two league matches.

data.title: Ben Sulayem drives major improvements to FIA’s international Sporting Code
data.description: DUBAI: The Federation Internationale de l’Automobile, the global governing body for motor sport and the federation for mobility organizations worldwide, has announced that it is to make major improvements to Appendix B of its International Sporting Code following an extensive review commissioned by FIA’s President Mohammed Ben Sulayem.

data.title: Russian delegation arrives in Turkiye for Ukraine war talks
data.description:
ISTANBUL: Russia’s delegation arrived in Istanbul for peace talks with Ukraine, Russian Foreign Ministry spokeswoman Maria Zakharova said Thursday, and a Ukrainian official said a delegation including President Volodymyr Zelensky was on its way the the Turkish capital Ankara.
	Russian President Vladimir Putin was not part of the delegation from Moscow, however, according to a list released by the Kremlin Wednesday night, prompting criticism from Western officials that the Kremlin isn’t serious about the peace effort.

data.title: Lufthansa group suspends Tel Aviv flights following Houthi attacks on Israel
data.description:
BERLIN: Airline group Lufthansa will suspend its flights to Tel Aviv through May 25, it said on Thursday, citing the “current situation.”
	This affects flights operated by Lufthansa, Swiss, Austrian Airlines, Eurowings, ITA Airways, Brussels Airlines and Lufthansa Cargo, it added.
	Global airlines have again halted their flights to and from Tel Aviv after a missile fired by Yemen’s Houthis toward Israel on May 4 landed near the country’s main international airport in Tel Aviv.

data.title: Al-Ain to host 6th IMMAF Youth World Championships in July
data.description:
ABU DHABI: The UAE Jiu-Jitsu and Mixed Martial Arts Federation has announced that the sixth IMMAF Youth World Championships will be held in Al-Ain Region for the first time from July 21-27.

	The tournament will be staged at the Al-Ain Convention Center with more than 1,000 male and female athletes from 60 countries competing in the championship’s largest event to date.

data.title: India says Pakistan nuclear arsenal should be under UN surveillance
data.description:
SRINAGAR: Pakistan’s nuclear arsenal should be brought under the surveillance of the UN’s nuclear agency, Indian Defense Minister Rajnath Singh said Thursday, following last week’s conflict between Islamabad and New Delhi.

	“I wanted to raise this question for the world: are nuclear weapons safe in the hands of a rogue and irresponsible nation?” Singh told troops at a base in Srinagar in Indian-administered Kashmir.

data.title: Madinah municipality continues intensive food safety inspections
data.description:
MADINAH: Food safety inspections have been stepped up ahead of the arrival of Hajj pilgrims, reported the Saudi Press Agency on Thursday.

	The Madinah Regional Municipality has carried out routine testing of commercial establishments, with 4,165 samples to date confirmed as conforming to approved standards. So far, 186 samples have been deemed unfit for human consumption.

data.title: Trump: India has offered US a trade deal with zero tariffs
data.description:
RIYADH: US President Donald Trump said on Thursday in Doha that India had offered the US a trade deal with zero tariffs.

	New Delhi is seeking to clinch a trade deal with the US within the 90-day pause on tariff hikes announced by Trump on April 9 for major trading partners, which had included a 26 percent tariff on India.

	“It is very hard to sell in India, and they are offering us a deal where basically they are willing to literally charge us no tariffs,” Trump said in a meeting with executives in Doha.
data.translatedTitle: Trump: India has offered US a trade deal with zero tariffs

data.title: Jordan evacuates second group of cancer patients from Gaza
data.description:
AMMAN: Jordan’s government on Wednesday began evacuating four child cancer patients and 12 family members from Gaza.

	They are the second group of patients evacuated for treatment under the Jordan Medical Corridor initiative, started in March this year, that aims to treat 2,000 Gazan children.

	The children and their families were evacuated by the Royal Jordanian Air Force in cooperation with the World Health Organization and the Ministry of Health.

	They will be treated at the King Hussein Cancer Center.

data.translatedTitle: An UU court blocks Trump's reciprocal tariffs

data.title: Jefes de bancada acuerdan reprogramar sesión legislativa para el martes 3 de junio
data.description: Tegucigalpa, Honduras.- Tras la suspensión de la sesión legislativa programada para este miércoles 28 de mayo en el Congreso Nacional , los jefes de bancada del Partido Liberal, Partido Nacional, Partido Salvador de Honduras y Libre alcanzaron un acuerdo para reanudar la sesión el próximo martes 3 de junio . El jefe de bancada del partido Libre, Rafael Sarmiento, confirmó que se suspendió la sesión prevista para las 7:00 de la noche y se acordó continuar con la misma sesión ordinaria que fue interrumpida más temprano. Aclaró que no se trata de una nueva convocatoria, sino de la continuación de la sesión aún abierta. Sarmiento afirmó que "el punto central será la aprobación del Presupuesto Especial para las Elecciones Generales de noviembre , remitido por el Consejo Nacional Electoral". Las bancadas opositoras más temprano habían solicitado una sesión extraordinaria para garantizar el cumplimiento del calendario electoral. “Lo importante es que hemos alcanzado un consenso, un acuerdo político para aprobar el presupuesto para las elecciones generales y no retrasar el proceso electoral”, reiteró Sarmiento. Por su lado, el diputado Ramón Barrios , también del partido Libre, reafirmó “hemos llegado a un acuerdo político. Se suspende la sesión convocada para esta noche y se continuará el martes 3 de junio. Es importante aclarar que no se trata de una sesión nueva, sino de la misma sesión ordinaria que fue suspendida hoy y que sigue abierta”, explicó. Barrios subrayó que el tema central será la aprobación del presupuesto electoral, pues "no podemos fallarle al país en este momento". Con el acuerdo entre oficialismo y oposición, se espera que el Congreso Nacional avance de forma oportuna en la aprobación del presupuesto electoral de cara a las elecciones de noviembre. La sesión de este miércoles, que había sido convocada para las 5:00 de la tarde, fue suspendida abruptamente para las 7:00 de la noche debido a la tensión que se registró en el hemiciclo y las denuncias de agresiones de la diputada Kathia Crivelli contra el diputado Bartolo Fuentes. Asimismo, diputados de la oposición denunciaron que les impidieron ingresar al hemiciclo y eso habría originado la suspensión de la sesión, pues las bancadas de oposición se oponían a aprobar en la misma acta los préstamos del CAF (Banco de Desarrollo de América Latina y el Caribe).
data.translatedTitle: Banking Chiefs agree to reprogram legislative session for Tuesday, June 3
data.translatedDescription: TEGUCIGALPA, HONDURAS.- After the suspension of the legislative session scheduled for this Wednesday, May 28 at the National Congress, the Banking Chiefs of the Liberal Party, National Party, Salvador de Honduras and Free Party reached an agreement to resume the session next Tuesday, June 3. The Chief of Bank of the Free Party, Rafael Sarmiento, confirmed that the session scheduled for 7:00 at night was suspended and agreed to continue with the same ordinary session that was interrupted earlier. He clarified that it is not a new call, but the continuation of the session still open. Sarmiento said that "the central point will be the approval of the special budget for the general elections of November, sent by the National Electoral Council." The earliest opposition benches had requested an extraordinary session to guarantee compliance with the electoral calendar. "The important thing is that we have reached a consensus, a political agreement to approve the budget for the general elections and not delay the electoral process," Sarmiento reiterated. On the other hand, Deputy Ramón Barrios, also of the Free Party, reaffirmed “we have reached a political agreement. The session called for tonight is suspended and will continue on Tuesday, June 3. It is important to clarify that it is not a new session, but the same ordinary session that was suspended today and that it remains open,” he explained. Barrios stressed that the central issue will be the approval of the electoral budget, because "we cannot fail the country at this time." With the agreement between ruling and opposition, the National Congress is expected to advance in a timely manner in the approval of the electoral budget for the November elections. This Wednesday's session, which had been convened for 5:00 in the afternoon, was abruptly suspended for 7:00 at night due to the tension that was recorded in the hemicycle and the complaints of aggressions of Deputy Kathia Crivelli against Deputy Bartolo Fuentes. Likewise, opposition deputies denounced that they were prevented from entering the hemicycle and that would have caused the suspension of the session, since the opposition benches opposed to approve in the same act the loans of the CAF (Development Bank of Latin America and the Caribbean).

data.title: Bancadas de la oposición piden sesión extraordinaria para aprobar presupuesto electoral
data.description: Tegucigalpa, Honduras .- Los jefes de bancada del Partido Nacional, Partido Liberal y Partido Salvador de Honduras solicitaron este miércoles, 28 de mayo, la convocatoria urgente a una sesión extraordinaria del Congreso Nacional , con el único objetivo de aprobar el Presupuesto Especial para las Elecciones Generales remitido por el Consejo Nacional Electoral ( CNE ). En una carta dirigida al presidente del Legislativo, Luis Redondo , los líderes opositores denunciaron que no se les permitió ingresar al hemiciclo durante la sesión ordinaria de esta tarde, situación que consideran una violación a sus derechos constitucionales. La sesión fue finalmente suspendida por falta de quorum y reprogramada para las 7:00 de la noche de este mismo miércoles. Los firmantes argumentan que la aprobación del presupuesto electoral es urgente para garantizar el proceso democrático y evitar un retraso que podría poner en riesgo las elecciones generales. En su petición, también expresan preocupación por lo que califican como una práctica “maliciosa” por parte de la directiva del Congreso, al pretender incorporar este tema en una agenda legislativa aún no cerrada, lo cual —según ellos— busca forzar a la mayoría opositora a votar sobre otros asuntos de manera conjunta. “La solicitud se hace en estricto apego al respeto democrático de nuestra Constitución”, afirman en el documento, en el que insisten en que la convocatoria debe hacerse con al menos 24 horas de anticipación, como establece la ley. Los jefes de bancada advierten que cualquier intento de manipular los procedimientos legislativos representa un atentado contra el debido proceso.
data.translatedTitle: Opposition benches ask for extraordinary session to approve electoral budget
data.translatedDescription: Tegucigalpa, Honduras .- The Banking Chiefs of the National Party, Liberal Party and Salvador de Honduras requested this Wednesday, May 28, the urgent call to an extraordinary session of the National Congress, with the sole objective of passing the special budget for the general elections sent by the National Electoral Council (CNE). In a letter addressed to the president of the Legislative, Luis Redondo, opposition leaders denounced that they were not allowed to enter the hemicycle during the ordinary session of this afternoon, a situation that they consider a violation of their constitutional rights. The session was finally suspended due to lack of Quorum and reprogrammed for 7:00 p.m. on Wednesday. The signatories argue that the approval of the electoral budget is urgent to guarantee the democratic process and avoid a delay that could put the general elections at risk. In their request, they also express concern about what they describe as a “malicious” practice by the directive of the Congress, pretending to incorporate this issue into a legislative agenda not yet closed, which - according to them - seeks to force the opposition majority to vote on other matters jointly. "The application is made in strict adherence to the democratic respect of our Constitution," they say in the document, in which they insist that the call must be made at least 24 hours in advance, as established by law. Banking bosses warn that any attempt to manipulate legislative procedures represents an attack on due process.

data.title: Kathia Crivelli acusa a Bartolo Fuentes de agresión en el Congreso Nacional
data.description: Tegucigalpa, Honduras.- Desorden y agresiones se registraron la tarde-noche de este miércoles dentro del Congreso Nacional (CN) que preside Luis Redondo . Congresistas del Partido Liberal se encontraban en uno de los salones del Poder Legislativo y fue allí cuando se registraron los hechos violentos con parlamentarios del Partido Libertad y Refundación (Libre) . La diputada liberal por Cortés, Kathia Crivelli , denunció al llegar al hemiciclo que su homólogo Bartolo Fuentes de Libre la agredió físicamente y hasta mostró a las cámaras sus lesiones. "Él vino y estaba va de insultar allá, yo le dije que era coyote y que era un animal. En lo que le agarro el teléfono, él me golpeó, tengo acá el morete; yo no estoy mintiendo e incluso antes agredió a una compañera, eso es por lo que dije la vez pasada y él se la trae", dijo. A su vez, añadió: "Nunca en la vida, ni mi papá me había pegado para que este me venga a golpear a mí. Una cosa es que estemos en desacuerdo, pero otra es la agresión física... Lo voy a ir a denunciar". Sin embargo, Bartolo Fuentes adujo que no es cierta la versión de Crivelle y, por el contrario, fue golpeado por parte de Jorge Cálix . Bartolo Fuentes ya tiene denuncias de agresiones a féminas, como sucedió en 2024 en contra de la congresista de su mismo partido político Melbi Ortiz . Fuentes buscó en marzo pasado la reelección en los comicios primarios, pero no contó con el apoyo popular.
data.translatedTitle: Kathia Crivelli accuses Bartolo sources of aggression in the National Congress
data.translatedDescription: Tegucigalpa, Honduras.- Disorder and aggressions were recorded on Wednesday afternoon within the National Congress (CN) chaired by Luis Redondo. Congressmen of the Liberal Party were in one of the halls of the Legislative Power and it was there when the violent events with parliamentarians of the Freedom and Refoundation (free) party were recorded. The liberal deputy for Cortés, Kathia Crivelli, denounced when he reached the hemicycle that her counterpart Bartolo sources of free assault her physically and even showed her injuries to the cameras. "He came and was insulting there, I told him that it was Coyote and that it was an animal. In what grabbed the phone, he hit me, I have the brunette here; I am not lying and even before he assaulted a partner, that is why I said last time and he brings it to him," he said. In turn, he added: "Never in life, nor my dad had hit me so that he comes to hit me. One thing is that we disagree, but another is the physical aggression ... I will go to denounce it." However, Bartolo Fuentes argued that the version of Crivele is not true and, on the contrary, it was beaten by Jorge Callix. Bartolo Fuentes already has complaints of aggressions to females, as happened in 2024 against the congresswoman of the same political party Melbi Ortiz. Fuentes sought last March re -election in the primary elections, but did not have popular support.

data.title: Ambiente hostil en el Congreso Nacional y denuncian a Bartolo Fuentes de Libre de agresión
data.description: Tegucigalpa, Honduras -. El ambiente en el Congreso Nacional se vuelve tenso, hostil y a punto de desencadenar en violencia y enfrentamientos entre diputados oficialistas de Libre y de la oposición, según informan medios radiales. Una de las versiones es que, aparentemente, la seguridad del Congreso Nacional y otros diputados oficialistas, en particular se menciona a Bartolo Fuentes, obstruyeron el ingreso de parlamentarios de la oposición al pleno del hemiciclo. La otra versión es que la oposición decidió no entrar al hemiciclo para impedir tener quorum de un mínimo de 65. Al no haber quorum, Luis Redondo decidió suspender la sesión y convocarla para las 7:00 de la noche de este miércoles (28 de mayo) y anunció una reunión de la Junta Directiva con los jefes de bancada. Redondo advirtió que si no hay acuerdos aplicará la Constitución de la República. Diputados de la oposición advirtieron que Redondo buscará llenar las vacantes de la oposición con diputados suplentes de Libre a fin de aprobar el cierre de acta sin consenso. Mientras eso ocurría, en la parte de atrás del hemiciclo se dio una confrontación entre diputados de Libre y la oposición. Kathia Crivelli , diputada de Libre, acusó a Bartolo Fuentes de agredirla violentamente, al grado que le dejó unos moretes y rasguños. Redondo incluso ordenó poner en las pantallas del hemiciclo lo que pasaba en la parte de atrás, pero cuando vio el ambiente hostil, dio una contra orden. El diputado liberal Jorge Cálix narró que tuvo que interceder él para defender a Crivelli. “No me siento orgulloso de esto, pero tuve que defender a una mujer”, dijo el diputado. Crivelli reconoció que Cálix la defendió.
data.translatedTitle: Hostile atmosphere in the National Congress and denounce Bartolo sources of aggression free
data.translatedDescription: Tegucigalpa, Honduras -. The atmosphere in the National Congress becomes tense, hostile and about to trigger violence and clashes between official deputies of free and opposition, as radial media report. One of the versions is that, apparently, the security of the National Congress and other official deputies, in particular Bartolo Fuentes are mentioned, obstructed the entry of parliamentarians from the opposition to the plenary of the hemicycle. The other version is that the opposition decided not to enter the hemicycle to prevent quorum from a minimum of 65. As there is no quorum, Luis Redondo decided to suspend the session and summon it for 7:00 p.m. on Wednesday (May 28) and announced a meeting of the Board of Directors with the bench heads. Redondo warned that if there are no agreements, the Constitution of the Republic will apply. Opposition deputies warned that Redondo will seek to fill the vacancies of the opposition with substitute deputies of free in order to approve the closure of the act without consensus. While that happened, in the back of the hemicycle there was a confrontation between free deputies and the opposition. Kathia Crivelli, deputy of Libre, accused Bartolo sources of violently assaulting her, to the degree that left some brunettes and scratches. Redondo even ordered to put on the hemicycle screens what happened in the back, but when he saw the hostile atmosphere, he gave an order. Liberal deputy Jorge Cálix said he had to intercede him to defend Crivelli. "I don't feel proud of this, but I had to defend a woman," said the deputy. Crivelli acknowledged that Cálix defended her.

data.title: Consulado debe tramitar documento de identificación para retorno al país de Matta
data.description: Tegucigalpa, Honduras.- A la espera de una posible excarcelación, la familia de Juan Ramón Matta Ballesteros , el primer hondureño extraditado a Estados Unidos, mantiene la esperanza de que pueda volver a Honduras tras 37 años en prisión. Para que esto se pueda dar, aparte de la decisión que adopte el tribunal que el 27 de mayo autorizó su liberación en Springfield, Missouri, además, es pertinente la intervención de las autoridades hondureñas. Óscar Cálix, apoderado legal de la familia Matta en Honduras, dijo que para que eso suceda "estamos a la espera de que se presente (a la cárcel) el cónsul más cercano que tiene la República de Honduras en Estados Unidos -Él (Matta) está en una prisión federal de Springfield Missouri-, entonces, tenemos entendido que la más cercana es el de Chicago". Agregó: "Estamos esperando que el Consulado de Honduras se presente a la prisión de Springfield, Missouri y que proceda a extender, ya sea un salvoconducto o un pasaporte de emergencia, en virtud de que él al estar 37 años preso no tiene documentación para poder viajar y salir del país". El profesional del derecho reveló que la familia de Matta Ballesteros, intentó hace algunos años empadronar o obtener el Documento Nacional de Identificación (DNI) mediante el Consulado de Honduras en Chicago, pero que la acción no les fue permitida por las autoridades de la prisión federal en la que él se encuentra. El regreso a Honduras de Matta Ballesteros también depende de la gestión que pudiera hacer el Servicio de Control de Inmigración y Aduanas de los Estados Unidos (ICE, por sus siglas en inglés), en materia migratoria. Al ser liberado o excarcelado, el ICE debería de intervenir para hacer el proceso de deportación del connacional, pero para hacer ese trámite de índole migratorio es necesario que tenga un documento de identificación en el que haga constar su identidad, nacionalidad y su número de DNI o pasaporte, si fuera el caso. Los parientes de Juan Ramón, residentes en los Estados Unidos, aguardan a que ocurran ambos trámites: la confirmación del tribunal sobre la liberación, pero además, la agilización desde el Consulado de Honduras en Chicago, para extenderle una identificación a su familiar y que pueda ser deportado de Estados Unidos. "Desde diciembre (de 2024) estábamos esperando el dictamen (de la solicitud para la aplicación del tratado de Estrasburgo) por parte de la Secretaría de Gobernación y Justicia; (pero) nunca nos quiso atender el secretario de gobernación", reveló Óscar Cálix. La llegada de Ramón Matta aún no es segura. La Fiscalía de Estados Unidos presentó una moción para suspender la ejecución del fallo que beneficia con liberación inmediata del excapo hondureño.
data.translatedTitle: Consulate must process identification document to return to Matta's country
data.translatedDescription: TEGUCIGALPA, HONDURAS.- Waiting for a possible release, the family of Juan Ramón Matta Ballesteros, the first Honduran extradited to the United States, maintains the hope that he can return to Honduras after 37 years in prison. In order for this to be given, apart from the decision adopted by the court that on May 27 authorized his release in Springfield, Missouri, in addition, the intervention of the Honduran authorities is relevant. Óscar Calix, legal attorney of the Matta family in Honduras, said that for that it happens "we are waiting for the nearest consul of the Republic of Honduras in the United States in the United States -he (Matta) is in a federal prison in Springfield Missouri-, then we understand that the closest is that of Chicago." He added: "We are waiting for the Consulate of Honduras to appear at the Springfield prison, Missouri and that it proceeds to extend, either a safe -conduct or an emergency passport, because he is 37 years imprisoned has no documentation to travel and leave the country." The Law Professional revealed that Matta Ballesteros' family tried a few years ago registering or obtaining the National Identification Document (DNI) through the Consulate of Honduras in Chicago, but that the action was not allowed by the authorities of the federal prison in which he is. The return to Honduras of Matta Ballesteros also depends on the management that the Immigration and Customs Control Service of the United States (ICE), in immigration matters, in migratory matters. When released or released, ICE should intervene to do the connational deportation process, but to do that migratory procedure, it is necessary that you have an identification document in which it records its identity, nationality and its ID number or passport, if it were the case. The relatives of Juan Ramón, residents in the United States, await both procedures: the confirmation of the court on liberation, but in addition, the streamlining from the Consulate of Honduras in Chicago, to extend an identification to his relative and that he can be deported from the United States. "Since December (2024) we were waiting for the opinion (of the application for the application of the Strasbourg Treaty) by the Ministry of the Interior and Justice; (but) the Secretary of the Interior never wanted to attend to us," said Óscar Calix. Ramón Matta's arrival is not yet safe. The United States Prosecutor's Office presented a motion to suspend the execution of the ruling that benefits with immediate release from the excapo Honduraño.

data.title: Criminalité : Une force anti-gangs composée de mercenaires américains en opérations en Haïti, révèle The New York Times
data.description: Des entrepreneurs américains, dont Erik Prince, ont été recrutés, ces derniers mois, par le gouvernement haïtien pour travailler au sein d'une force d'intervention secrète, chargée de déployer des drones destinés à éliminer des membres de gangs, rapporte le journal américain The New York Times, citant des experts en sécurité. - Perspectives
data.translatedTitle: Crime: An anti-gang force made up of American mercenaries in operations in Haiti, reveals The New York Times
data.translatedDescription: American entrepreneurs, including Erik Prince, have been recruited in recent months by the Haitian government to work in a secret intervention force, responsible for deploying drones intended to eliminate gang members, reports the American newspaper The New York Times, citing security experts. - Perspectives

data.title: Haïti-Environnement : Vers une nouvelle feuille de route environnementale 2025–2050

data.title: Haïti-Sécurité : Lancement à Port-au-Prince d'un centre de commandement des communications, doté de technologies avancées
data.description: Lancement conjoint, le mardi 27 mai 2025, à Port-au-Prince, par États-Unis d'Amérique en Haïti, la Police nationale d'Haïti (Pnh) et les partenaires internationaux d'un Centre de commandement des communications, exploitant les technologies avancées, pour coordonner et améliorer les opérations de sécurité en Haïti. - Dépêches
data.translatedTitle: Haiti-security: launch in Port-au-Prince of a communications command center, with advanced technologies
data.translatedDescription: A joint launch, Tuesday, May 27, 2025, in Port-au-Prince, by United States of America in Haiti, the National Police in Haiti (PNH) and the international partners of a communications command center, operating advanced technologies, to coordinate and improve security operations in Haiti. - dispatches

data.title: Haïti : Démocratie entravée, Constitution en débat (1987–2025)
data.description: Analyse approfondie de l'évolution du processus constitutionnel haïtien de 1987 à 2025, entre aspirations démocratiques, blocages politiques, amendements controversés et tentatives de refonte, dans un contexte de crise institutionnelle persistante. - Perspectives
data.translatedTitle: Haiti: hampered democracy, constitution in debate (1987–2025)
data.translatedDescription: In -depth analysis of the evolution of the Haitian constitutional process from 1987 to 2025, between democratic aspirations, political blockages, controversial amendments and attempted redesign, in a context of persistent institutional crisis. - Perspectives

data.title: Haïti – Justice : L'avant-projet de Constitution mettrait en péril l'indépendance judiciaire, alerte l'Apm
data.description: L'Association professionnelle des magistrats (Apm) critique l'avant-projet de Constitution, publié le 21 mai 2025, dénonçant l'insuffisance de garanties pour l'indépendance du pouvoir judiciaire et l'absence de consultation du secteur. - Perspectives
data.translatedTitle: Haiti-Justice: the preliminary draft constitution would jeopardize judicial independence, alerts the APM
data.translatedDescription: The Professional Association of Magistrates (APM) criticizes the preliminary draft constitution, published on May 21, 2025, denouncing the insufficiency of guarantees for the independence of the judiciary and the absence of consultation of the sector. - Perspectives

data.title: Crise : 60 organisations tirent la sonnette d'alarme sur la situation sécuritaire et humanitaire en Haïti
data.description: Le Clio, regroupement d'une soixantaine d'Ongs, alerte sur la crise humanitaire en Haïti et appelle à une réponse urgente et respectueuse des droits. - Dépêches
data.translatedTitle: Crisis: 60 organizations sound the alarm on the security and humanitarian situation in Haiti
data.translatedDescription: The Clio, grouping of around sixty NGOs, alert to the humanitarian crisis in Haiti and calls for an urgent and respectful response. - dispatches

data.title: Haïti-Société : Entre désastre humanitaire et crise socioéconomique au Plateau central
data.description: Situation lamentable au haut Plateau central, qui croule sous des tonnes de déchets, dans un contexte de fuite de milliers de personnes déplacées, chassées par la terreur des gangs terroristes armés. - A travers Haiti
data.translatedTitle: Haiti-Société: between humanitarian disaster and socioeconomic crisis on the central plateau
data.translatedDescription: Lovable situation on the high central plateau, which is crumbling under tons of waste, in a context of leakage of thousands of displaced people, hunted by the terror of armed terrorist gangs. - Through Haiti

data.title: Haïti : In memoriam Didier Dominique, Éclaireur des horizons nouveaux

data.translatedTitle: Haiti: in Memoriam Didier Dominique, scout new horizons
data.translatedDescription: Tribute to Didier Dominique, committed intellectual, tireless trade unionist, thinker of the city and Haitian culture, a major figure in social struggles, died May 18, 2025. - Documents

data.title: Haïti : Infirmières et infirmiers en première ligne, mais toujours en marge
data.description: En Haïti, les infirmières et infirmiers jouent un rôle vital dans le système de santé, mais restent sous-payé·e·s, marginalisé·e·s et exposé·e·s à de multiples risques. Un cri d'alarme pour une profession essentielle, mais oubliée. - Perspectives
data.translatedTitle: Haiti: first line nurses, but still on the sidelines
data.translatedDescription: In Haiti, nurses play a vital role in the health system, but remain underpaid, marginalized and exposed to multiple risks. A cry of alarm for an essential, but forgotten profession. - Perspectives

data.title: Rahakotile ei anta armu: juulist tõusvad käibemaks, kütuse- ja tubakaaktsiis
data.description: Käesolev aasta on toonud kaasa rea aktsiisitõuse, mis suurendavad otseselt tarbijate kulutusi kütusele, alkoholile ja elektrienergiale. Juulist kehtima hakkav 24-protsendine käibemaks lisab hinnatõusudele veelgi suurema surve.
data.translatedTitle: The wallet is not given grace: VAT rising from July, fuel and tobacco excise
data.translatedDescription: This year has led to a number of excise increases that directly increase consumer expenditure on fuel, alcohol and electricity. The 24 % VAT, which will come into force in July, adds even more pressure to the price increases.

data.title: Minu Türgi päris nägu: valesti mõistetud paradiis
data.description: Mulle tundub, et Türgi on sihtpunkt, mida on eriti lihtne valesti mõista. Kuskilt on tulnud see massiivne kuvand, et seal tahetakse sulle igal nurgal midagi pähe määrida – türkiissinist talismani, odavat vaipa või paadireisi, mille hind tõuseb samas tempos hommikupäikesega. Või päikesetool basseini ääres on privileeg, mille nimel tuleb hommikul kell seitse rüselema minna ja loota, et oled naabrist nobedam. Et kõik-hinnas hotellid pakuvad keskpärast buffeed, kärakat voolab ojadena ja basseini ääres lauldakse valjuhäälselt «Kalinkat». Aga see pole Türgi, mille mina leidsin.
data.translatedTitle: My Turkish pretty face: a misunderstanding paradise
data.translatedDescription: It seems to me that Turkey is a destination that is particularly easy to misunderstand. Somewhere, this massive image has come that you want to smear something on every corner - a turquoise talisman, a cheap rug or a boat trip, which rises at the same pace as the morning sun. Or the sun chair by the pool is a privilege that you have to scramble at seven in the morning and hope that you are fleeter than your neighbor. As all-price hotels offer a mediocre buffet, the noisy flows as streams, and "Kalinkat" is sung loudly by the pool. But that's not the Turkey I found.

data.translatedDescription: A delegation led by Woo Won-Shiko, chairman of the South Korean Parliament, comes to Lithuania on Thursday.

data.title: Atidengiama poetui Sigitui Gedai skirta skulptūra „Užupio obeliskas“
data.description: Vilniuje, Užupio ir Krivių gatvių sankryžoje, ketvirtadienį bus atidengtas obeliskas, skirtas poetui Sigitui Gedai.
data.translatedTitle: The sculpture "Užupis Obelisk" for the poet Sigitas Geda is unveiled
data.translatedDescription: At the intersection of Užupio and Krivių streets, an obelisk will be unveiled on Thursday for the poet Sigitas Geda.

data.title: Kristijono Bartoševičiaus seksualinių nusikaltimų byloje tęsiamas paskutinis kaltinamojo žodis
data.description: Buvusio Seimo nario Kristijono Bartoševičiaus seksualinių nusikaltimų prieš nepilnamečius byloje ketvirtadienį Panevėžio apygardos teismas toliau klausys paskutiniojo kaltinamojo žodžio.

data.title: Final day for some to change their election district
data.description: Until midnight on Thursday, 29 May, it is still possible to change your polling station for the local elections taking place in a week and a half. You can change to the municipality where you own real estate if your registered place of residence is in another municipality, Latvian Television reports.
data.translatedTitle: Final day for some to change their election district

You can change to the municipality where you own real estate if your registered place of residence is in another municipality, Latvian Television reports.

data.title: Ministries plead to 'watch' the new Rēzekne council
data.description: With local elections approaching, the temporary administration will spend its last week in office in Rēzekne. Both the Ministry of Finance and the Ministry of Environmental Protection and Regional Development (VARAM) are satisfied with its work, but the new council will have to adhere to strict financial discipline, Latvian Radio reported on 28 May.

data.title: Over €17,000 in damages in bridge robberies in Kurzeme
data.description: In May, several bridges in Kurzeme had their railings stolen, posing a safety risk to road users and causing losses of almost €17,000 to Latvijas Valsts ceļi (Latvian State Roads). The police recently arrested two young people on suspicion of theft, and the bridge railings are expected to be replaced in the near future, TV Kurzeme reported on 29 May.

data.title: Weekend calendar: Bookfest, DokStation, Bucharest Organ Fest, West Side Flower Fest, Film Garden reopening, Art Encounters, Este Film Festival and more
data.description: One of Bucharest’s main book fairs is open this weekend, with Portugal as guest country, adding to options that also include film and music festivals and a flower fest. Meanwhile, Timişoara focuses on contemporary art with the opening of the Art Encounters Biennial, and Sibiu on recent European film. In Bucharest: Bookfest May 28 - June 1 Portugal is the guest country at this year's edition of the event taking place at Romexpo. Among the Portuguese authors attending the fair will be José Luís Peixoto and Gonçalo M. Tavares. More on the program here . DokStation Music Documentary Film Festival May 28 - June 1 The event focuses on showcasing national and international music documentaries to tell the true stories behind the music and examines music in all its complexity and history. More details here . Bucharest Organ Fest June 1 – June 15 The festival explores the organ in its various roles, presenting the instrument as a soloist, chamber partner or accompanist. The event takes place at the Roman Catholic Cathedral St. Joseph, the National University of Music Bucharest, the Evangelical Church of the Holy Trinity, the Sacré-Coeur Church and the Labyrinth Church. Further details here . West Side Flower Fest May 30 – June 1 Bucharest’s Drumul Taberei Park turns into a fairytale setting as 15 themed gardens aim to take visitors into the universe of various books. More info here . Femei pe Mătăsari/ Women on Mătăsari May 30 – June 1 Art, music, and good cheer await the public on Bucharest’s Mătăsari Street. More here . World Press Photo exhibition Until June 1 University Square hosts the Bucharest stop of the world-wide tour showcasing the stories that matter with photography from the 68th annual World Press Photo Contest. More here . Open Streets Until October 12 The program that turns the city's main arteries into pedestrian areas returns with a program of live concerts, street performances, dance evenings, parades, children's workshops and creative activities, guided tours, and areas for exercise and sports. More here . Art Safari Until July 27 The current edition of the art event features exhibitions on Ioan Andreescu, Ion Țuculescu, forgotten Romanian painters, but also the new generation of artists. More details here . The event is closed for the Easter Sunday but open the Saturday before. Concerts @ George Enescu Philharmonic May 22, 23 George Enescu Philharmonic Orchestra, conducted by Ana María Patiño-Osorio, performs a program of works by Haydn , Dmitri Shostakovich and Beethoven. Trumpeter Tine Thing Helseth and pianist Federico Colli are the soloists. More here . Ignacio Uriarte: Symbolism Until June 21 The solo exhibition, open at Gaep, presents drawings and sculptural pieces, including a large group of nine drawings that signal a new direction in Ignacio Uriarte’s practice. Without relinquishing his adherence to the tools, gestures, and routines of office environments, he embraces a more colorful aesthetic and a more playful approach to corporate life. Further details here . Cats Are Taking Over Until July 30 This is the inaugural exhibition of Vila Catena's contemporary art pavilion, a Sandwich and the Fildas Art Foundation joint initiative, via the Catena for Art program. The exhibition "explores the universe of the most charismatic domestic felines, often considered too trivial for "serious" art, reclaiming their place in contemporary creation." More on the show and the artists included here . MoBU 2025 May 28 – June 1 The contemporary art fair is held at Romexpo, gathering local and international galleries. More here . Open Doors @Cotroceni Palace Weekends The program that sees the garden of the Cotroceni Palace, the seat of the Presidential Administration, continues this weekend as well. Admission to the garden and the Cotroceni Church is free. Visitors can also check the Cotroceni Museum and parts of the Palace of the Presidential Administration for a fee. More details here . Film Garden reopening May 28 – September 28 The Film Garden (Grădina cu Filme), the venue in Bucharest’s Alexandru Lahovari Square that hosts outdoor film screenings, will host a variety of screenings and talks with directors. More here . In the country: Art Encounters Biennial May 30 – July 13 The Timişoara event explores at this edition the theme of Bounding Histories. Whispering Tales as it showcases more than 100 works by 60 artists, including five specially commissioned creations that examine the city’s historic layers. Curators Ana Janevski (MoMA New York) and Tevž Logar (independent curator) invite the public to reflect on the city’s complex past and discover the hidden stories of emblematic places: the Garrison Headquarters – a former military building, FABER – a former factory, and the headquarters of the Art Encounters Foundation, a space with an industrial and educational history. More details here . Este Film Festival May 28 – June 1 The event held in Sibiu brings a selection of films awarded at well-known festivals, among them Karlovy Vary, Locarno and San Sebastián, offering the public the opportunity to explore the most innovative productions of recent European cinema. More here . Origins – A Story of Rhythm Until June 5 This tour of 11 cities brings together musicians Matei Ioachimescu, Irina Rădulescu, Răzvan Florescu, Arthur Balogh and Philip Goron in a show that explores rhythms and sounds from around the world: from flamenco and salsa, to oriental, Balkan and African influences. The cities included in the tour are Arad, Timișoara, Sfântu Gheorghe, Ploiești, Bucharest, Buzău, Câmpulung Moldovenesc, Baia Mare, Satu Mare, Bistrița, and Cluj-Napoca. (Photo: Cristi Croitoru | Dreamstime.com ) editor@romania-insider.com

data.title: France's Bookfest program brings writer Éric Reinhardt to Bucharest book fair
data.description: French author Éric Reinhardt will be present at this year's edition of Bookfest, the book fair currently taking place in Bucharest with Portugal as guest country . Author of novels that examine the mechanisms of power, identity, and femininity, Reinhardt has established himself through titles such as L'Amour et les Forêts (Prix Renaudot des lycées, 2014), recently adapted for cinema, and Comédies françaises (Prix Les Inrockuptibles, 2020). At Bookfest, he will be the protagonist of a conversation with journalist and writer Ioana Maria Stăncescu during an event on May 30. The discussion, held in French, will explore the representations of femininity and the metamorphosis of identity in his literature, with the participation of professor Lidia Cotea, the director of the Department of French Language and Literature at the University of Bucharest. The presence of the French author is part of France's program at Bookfest, organized by the French Institute in Romania. Another French guest is researcher and editor Olivier Roche, known for studies dedicated to Hergé's work and the Tintin universe. Author of the volume Tintin. Bibliographie d’un mythe (Les Impressions nouvelles, 2014 and 2025) and co-editor of the works Hergé au sommet and Tintin aujourd’hui. Images et imaginaires , Roche "opens, through what he called 'metatintinology,' a field of reflection that transcends the boundaries of comics as a simple narrative form." The space dedicated to comics will also see the participation of Dodo Niță, a historian of Romanian comics and author of the volume Tintin en Roumanie , as well as the Franco-Romanian artist Daniel Horia, known for the autobiographical graphic novel Je suis né roumain . The stand of France will also feature two authors who explore, each in their own way, the concept of belonging, memory and female identity. They are Sophie Képès, with the volume Désappartenir , a literary essay on identity, inner exile, and "non-belonging" as an existential choice, and Laurence Meiffret, with Génica Athanasiou – L'anti-muse d'Antonin Artaud , a biography about the Franco-Romanian actress who influenced the theater and avant-garde imagination of the 20th century. Romania and the Republic of Moldova's proposal for the Goncourt Prize will also be announced at Bookfest on May 29. Part of the international Choix Goncourt network, the event reflects the literary choice of the young generation of French-speaking readers. France's participation at Bookfest is part of the cultural season French Spring Together . Held between March and June 2025, it is part of the Centenary of the French Institute in Romania, which celebrates, through events, the 100 years of cultural, scientific and educational cooperation between France and Romania. The French Institute in Romania was founded in Bucharest on May 30, 1924, and later expanded to Cluj, Iași, and Timișoara. (Illustration: French Institute) simona@romania-insider.com

data.title: KineDok: Documentary film program held in alternative venues returns next month
data.description: KineDok , the European program screening documentaries in alternative spaces, returns in several cities in the country beginning June 5. The eleventh edition will run until April 2026 in museums, libraries, high schools, gardens, creative hubs, and bookstores, as well as in a former mine. The screenings are organized by over 20 local partners and coordinated by the national organizer, One World Romania Association. The edition’s selection includes 17 films and two immersive VR experiences. In addition to the 10 recent documentaries from the participating countries – the Czech Republic, Slovakia, Hungary, Croatia, and Romania – local partners can also screen a program of heritage shorts curated by researcher Adina Brădeanu, an archive film from the Czech Republic and a Focus Denmark part. The Romanian documentaries selected this year are Isabela Tent’s Alice On & Off and Ruxandra Gubernat’s Imaginary Youth . The program opens in Bucharest, Galați, and Valea Jiului with screenings of Marie-Magdalena Kocho’s The Other One/ Cealaltă . The documentary explores the theme of the needs of healthy siblings in families with children with disabilities through the eyes of a teenager. The screening in Bucharest will take place on June 5 at the Conacul Golescu Grant Recreation and Personal Development Center, located within the General Directorate of Social Assistance and Child Protection of District 6. The screening will be followed by a discussion with psychologist and psychotherapist Silvia Ciubotaru. In Galați, the screening will take place on June 5 at the Museum of Visual Art. The UrbanLab Valea Jiului Association, which joined the program last year, will screen the documentary The Other on June 7 at the Petrila Mine. Admission is free to all screenings. The films will be screened with Romanian subtitles. (Illustration: the organizers) simona@romania-insider.com

data.title: ‘Tightening the Screws’ – Germany’s Top Diplomat Is Tired of Putin’s Stalling
data.description: Germany and US share same goals in Ukraine policy to ensure that ‘Russia finally enters into serious negotiations’, the top diplomat says after meeting with officials in Washington

data.translatedDescription: Germany and US share same goals in Ukraine policy to ensure that ‘Russia finally enters into serious negotiations’, the top diplomat says after meeting with officials in Washington

data.title: ប្រធានាធិបតី​បារាំង លោក Macron មិន​គួរ​ភ្លេច​ចូល​លេង​កម្ពុជា ខណៈ​ជាន់​ទឹកដី​វៀតណាម
data.description: វា​ជា​រឿង​គួរ​ឱ្យ​ភ្ញាក់ផ្អើល និង​ជា​ទំព័រ​ថ្មី​ត្រូវ​បាន​កត់ត្រា​ក្នុង​ប្រវត្តិសាស្ត្រ ដែល​លោក​ប្រធានាធិបតី​បារាំង Emmanuel Macron បាន​ទៅ​ធ្វើ​ទស្សនកិច្ច​ផ្លូវ​រដ្ឋ​ក្នុង​ប្រទេស​វៀតណាម ជាប់​នឹង​កម្ពុជា តែ​បែរ​ជា​មិន​មក​ជាន់​ប្រទេស​កម្ពុជា​ទៅវិញ។ ហេតុ​អ្វី​បាន​ជា​លោក Macron ទៅ​វៀតណាម ហើយ​មិន​ចូល​ប្រទេស​កម្ពុជា? តើ​កម្ពុជា មិន​សំខាន់​មែន​ទេ ដែល​លោក Macron មិន​ជ្រើសរើស​ជា​ប្រទេស​មួយ​ដែល​ធ្លាប់​ស្ថិត​ក្រោម​អាណាព្យាបាល​ជិត ១០០​ឆ្នាំ មក​ជាន់​ដី​កម្ពុជា? ទាំងនោះ​សុទ្ធតែ​ជា​ចំណោទ​មួយ​ដែល​ត្រូវ​បាន​គិត​ថា លោក Macron ឱ្យ​តម្លៃ​ខ្ពស់​ណាស់​ទៅ​វៀតណាម បើ​ធៀប​នឹង​កម្ពុជា។ កាលពី​យប់​ថ្ងៃ​អាទិត្យ ទី​២៥ ខែ​ឧសភា ប្រធានាធិបតី​បារាំង លោក Emmanuel Macron បាន​ទៅ​ដល់​ទីក្រុង​ហាណូយ។ នៅ​ទីក្រុង​ហាណូយ មន្ត្រី​ជាន់ខ្ពស់​បក្ស​កុម្មុយនីស្ត​វៀតណាម រាប់​ទាំង​ប្រធានាធិបតី នាយករដ្ឋមន្ត្រី អគ្គលេខាធិការ​បក្ស សុទ្ធតែ​បាន​ជួប​លោក សន្ទនា​ជាមួយ​លោក Macron។ លោក Macron បាន​ឆ្លងកាត់​ពិធី​ទទួល​ស្វាគមន៍​ដោយ​ពិធី​ត្រួត​ពល និង​ក្រាល​កម្រាល​ព្រំ​ពណ៌​ក្រហម។ លោក Macron ត្រូវ​បាន​ស្វាគមន៍​យ៉ាង​ពេញមុខ​ពេញមាត់​ស័ក្តិសម​ជា​ប្រមុខ​រដ្ឋ​មួយ​នៃ​ប្រទេស​មហាអំណាច​នៅ​អឺរ៉ុប តែ​យ៉ាងហោចណាស់​កាន់តែ​ស័ក្តិសម​ទៀត ព្រោះ​បារាំង ធ្លាប់​ដាក់​អាណានិគម​លើ​វៀតណាម ជិត ១០០​ឆ្នាំ​ដែរ។ លោក Macron បាន​ទៅ​ដល់​វៀតណាម […] The post ប្រធានាធិបតី​បារាំង លោក Macron មិន​គួរ​ភ្លេច​ចូល​លេង​កម្ពុជា ខណៈ​ជាន់​ទឹកដី​វៀតណាម appeared first on The Cambodia Daily Khmer .
data.translatedTitle: ប្រធានាធិបតី​បារាំង លោក Macron មិន​គួរ​ភ្លេច​ចូល​លេង​កម្ពុជា ខណៈ​ជាន់​ទឹកដី​វៀតណាម
data.translatedDescription: វា​ជា​រឿង​គួរ​ឱ្យ​ភ្ញាក់ផ្អើល និង​ជា​ទំព័រ​ថ្មី​ត្រូវ​បាន​កត់ត្រា​ក្នុង​ប្រវត្តិសាស្ត្រ ដែល​លោក​ប្រធានាធិបតី​បារាំង Emmanuel Macron បាន​ទៅ​ធ្វើ​ទស្សនកិច្ច​ផ្លូវ​រដ្ឋ​ក្នុង​ប្រទេស​វៀតណាម ជាប់​នឹង​កម្ពុជា តែ​បែរ​ជា​មិន​មក​ជាន់​ប្រទេស​កម្ពុជា​ទៅវិញ។ ហេតុ​អ្វី​បាន​ជា​លោក Macron ទៅ​វៀតណាម ហើយ​មិន​ចូល​ប្រទេស​កម្ពុជា? តើ​កម្ពុជា មិន​សំខាន់​មែន​ទេ ដែល​លោក Macron មិន​ជ្រើសរើស​ជា​ប្រទេស​មួយ​ដែល​ធ្លាប់​ស្ថិត​ក្រោម​អាណាព្យាបាល​ជិត ១០០​ឆ្នាំ មក​ជាន់​ដី​កម្ពុជា? ទាំងនោះ​សុទ្ធតែ​ជា​ចំណោទ​មួយ​ដែល​ត្រូវ​បាន​គិត​ថា លោក Macron ឱ្យ​តម្លៃ​ខ្ពស់​ណាស់​ទៅ​វៀតណាម បើ​ធៀប​នឹង​កម្ពុជា។ កាលពី​យប់​ថ្ងៃ​អាទិត្យ ទី​២៥ ខែ​ឧសភា ប្រធានាធិបតី​បារាំង លោក Emmanuel Macron បាន​ទៅ​ដល់​ទីក្រុង​ហាណូយ។ នៅ​ទីក្រុង​ហាណូយ មន្ត្រី​ជាន់ខ្ពស់​បក្ស​កុម្មុយនីស្ត​វៀតណាម រាប់​ទាំង​ប្រធានាធិបតី នាយករដ្ឋមន្ត្រី អគ្គលេខាធិការ​បក្ស សុទ្ធតែ​បាន​ជួប​លោក សន្ទនា​ជាមួយ​លោក Macron។ លោក Macron បាន​ឆ្លងកាត់​ពិធី​ទទួល​ស្វាគមន៍​ដោយ​ពិធី​ត្រួត​ពល និង​ក្រាល​កម្រាល​ព្រំ​ពណ៌​ក្រហម។ លោក Macron ត្រូវ​បាន​ស្វាគមន៍​យ៉ាង​ពេញមុខ​ពេញមាត់​ស័ក្តិសម​ជា​ប្រមុខ​រដ្ឋ​មួយ​នៃ​ប្រទេស​មហាអំណាច​នៅ​អឺរ៉ុប តែ​យ៉ាងហោចណាស់​កាន់តែ​ស័ក្តិសម​ទៀត ព្រោះ​បារាំង ធ្លាប់​ដាក់​អាណានិគម​លើ​វៀតណាម ជិត ១០០​ឆ្នាំ​ដែរ។ លោក Macron បាន​ទៅ​ដល់​វៀតណាម […] The post ប្រធានាធិបតី​បារាំង លោក Macron មិន​គួរ​ភ្លេច​ចូល​លេង​កម្ពុជា ខណៈ​ជាន់​ទឹកដី​វៀតណាម appeared first on The Cambodia Daily Khmer .

data.title: លោក ហ៊ុន ម៉ាណែត យល់ព្រម​ជួយ​សម្រួល​ដល់​ពលរដ្ឋ​វៀតណាម​ដែល​កំពុង​រស់នៅ​ដោយ​ខុស​ច្បាប់​នៅ​កម្ពុជា
data.description: កូនប្រុស​មេដឹកនាំ​ខ្មែរ​ដែល​ត្រូវ​វៀតណាម លើក​បន្តុប លោក ហ៊ុន ម៉ាណែត ទទួលយក​សំណើ​នាយករដ្ឋមន្ត្រី​វៀតណាម លោក ផាម មិញជីញ (Pham Minh Chinh) ដែល​បាន​ស្នើ​ឱ្យ​ជួយ​សម្រួល​ដល់​ពលរដ្ឋ​វៀតណាម ដែល​កំពុង​រស់នៅ​ដោយ​ខុស​ច្បាប់​ក្នុង​ប្រទេស​កម្ពុជា​បន្ត​ទៀត។ ទីភ្នាក់ងារ​សារព័ត៌មាន​វៀតណាម (VNA) បាន​ចេញ​ចុះផ្សាយ​កាលពី​ថ្ងៃទី​២៦ ខែ​ឧសភា ឆ្នាំ​២០២៥ នេះ​ថា ក្នុង​ជំនួប​រវាង​ប្រមុខ​រដ្ឋាភិបាល​វៀតណាម កម្ពុជា និង​ឡាវ អំឡុង​ពេល​ចូលរួម​កិច្ចប្រជុំ​កំពូល​អាស៊ាន​ក្នុង​ទីក្រុង​កូឡាឡាំពួរ ប្រទេស​ម៉ាឡេស៊ី កាលពី​ថ្ងៃទី​២៦ ខែឧ​សភា នាយករដ្ឋមន្ត្រី​វៀតណាម បាន​ស្នើ​ឱ្យ​កម្ពុជា និង​ឡាវ ផ្តល់​ការ​គាំទ្រ​ដល់​ពលរដ្ឋ​វៀតណាម​ខុស​ច្បាប់​ដែល​កំពុង​រស់នៅ​ក្នុង​ប្រទេស​របស់​ពួកគេ​បន្ត​ទៀត។ ប្រភព​ដដែល​អះអាង​ថា នាយករដ្ឋមន្ត្រី​វៀតណាម លោក ផាម មិញជីញ បាន​សម្ដែង​នូវ​ការ​អរគុណ​ដល់​រដ្ឋាភិបាល​កម្ពុជា និង​ឡាវ ចំពោះ​ការ​យកចិត្ត​ទុកដាក់​លើ​ពលរដ្ឋ​វៀតណាម​ខុស​ច្បាប់​ដែល​កំពុង​រស់នៅ​ក្នុង​ប្រទេស​ទាំង​ពីរ​នេះ​នា​ពេល​កន្លង​មក។ សារព័ត៌មាន​វៀតណាម បញ្ជាក់​ថា នាយករដ្ឋមន្ត្រី​វៀតណាម លោក ផាម មិញជីញ បាន​ស្នើ​លោក ហ៊ុន ម៉ាណែត និង​ប្រមុខ​រដ្ឋាភិបាល​ឡាវ លោក សនសៃ ស៊ីផាន់ដន ឱ្យ​បន្ត​ផ្តល់​ការ​គាំទ្រ​ដល់​ប្រជាជន​កម្ពុជា និង​ឡាវ ដើមកំណើត​វៀតណាម […] The post លោក ហ៊ុន ម៉ាណែត យល់ព្រម​ជួយ​សម្រួល​ដល់​ពលរដ្ឋ​វៀតណាម​ដែល​កំពុង​រស់នៅ​ដោយ​ខុស​ច្បាប់​នៅ​កម្ពុជា appeared first on The Cambodia Daily Khmer .
data.translatedTitle: លោក ហ៊ុន ម៉ាណែត យល់ព្រម​ជួយ​សម្រួល​ដល់​ពលរដ្ឋ​វៀតណាម​ដែល​កំពុង​រស់នៅ​ដោយ​ខុស​ច្បាប់​នៅ​កម្ពុជា
data.translatedDescription: កូនប្រុស​មេដឹកនាំ​ខ្មែរ​ដែល​ត្រូវ​វៀតណាម លើក​បន្តុប លោក ហ៊ុន ម៉ាណែត ទទួលយក​សំណើ​នាយករដ្ឋមន្ត្រី​វៀតណាម លោក ផាម មិញជីញ (Pham Minh Chinh) ដែល​បាន​ស្នើ​ឱ្យ​ជួយ​សម្រួល​ដល់​ពលរដ្ឋ​វៀតណាម ដែល​កំពុង​រស់នៅ​ដោយ​ខុស​ច្បាប់​ក្នុង​ប្រទេស​កម្ពុជា​បន្ត​ទៀត។ ទីភ្នាក់ងារ​សារព័ត៌មាន​វៀតណាម (VNA) បាន​ចេញ​ចុះផ្សាយ​កាលពី​ថ្ងៃទី​២៦ ខែ​ឧសភា ឆ្នាំ​២០២៥ នេះ​ថា ក្នុង​ជំនួប​រវាង​ប្រមុខ​រដ្ឋាភិបាល​វៀតណាម កម្ពុជា និង​ឡាវ អំឡុង​ពេល​ចូលរួម​កិច្ចប្រជុំ​កំពូល​អាស៊ាន​ក្នុង​ទីក្រុង​កូឡាឡាំពួរ ប្រទេស​ម៉ាឡេស៊ី កាលពី​ថ្ងៃទី​២៦ ខែឧ​សភា នាយករដ្ឋមន្ត្រី​វៀតណាម បាន​ស្នើ​ឱ្យ​កម្ពុជា និង​ឡាវ ផ្តល់​ការ​គាំទ្រ​ដល់​ពលរដ្ឋ​វៀតណាម​ខុស​ច្បាប់​ដែល​កំពុង​រស់នៅ​ក្នុង​ប្រទេស​របស់​ពួកគេ​បន្ត​ទៀត។ ប្រភព​ដដែល​អះអាង​ថា នាយករដ្ឋមន្ត្រី​វៀតណាម លោក ផាម មិញជីញ បាន​សម្ដែង​នូវ​ការ​អរគុណ​ដល់​រដ្ឋាភិបាល​កម្ពុជា និង​ឡាវ ចំពោះ​ការ​យកចិត្ត​ទុកដាក់​លើ​ពលរដ្ឋ​វៀតណាម​ខុស​ច្បាប់​ដែល​កំពុង​រស់នៅ​ក្នុង​ប្រទេស​ទាំង​ពីរ​នេះ​នា​ពេល​កន្លង​មក។ សារព័ត៌មាន​វៀតណាម បញ្ជាក់​ថា នាយករដ្ឋមន្ត្រី​វៀតណាម លោក ផាម មិញជីញ បាន​ស្នើ​លោក ហ៊ុន ម៉ាណែត និង​ប្រមុខ​រដ្ឋាភិបាល​ឡាវ លោក សនសៃ ស៊ីផាន់ដន ឱ្យ​បន្ត​ផ្តល់​ការ​គាំទ្រ​ដល់​ប្រជាជន​កម្ពុជា និង​ឡាវ ដើមកំណើត​វៀតណាម […] The post លោក ហ៊ុន ម៉ាណែត យល់ព្រម​ជួយ​សម្រួល​ដល់​ពលរដ្ឋ​វៀតណាម​ដែល​កំពុង​រស់នៅ​ដោយ​ខុស​ច្បាប់​នៅ​កម្ពុជា appeared first on The Cambodia Daily Khmer .

data.title: Tajikistan seeks Asian Development Bank support to establish Glacier Preservation Fund
data.description: Tajikistan is looking to the Asian Development Bank (ADB) for support in creating an International Trust Fund dedicated to preserving glaciers.  According to the Tajik president’s official website, his was announced during a meeting between Tajikistan’s President Emomali Rahmon and ADB Vice-President Yingming Yang held in Dushanbe on May 28.

data.title: Эмомали Рахмон сменил ректоров ряда вузов, руководителей «Кохи Борбад» и «Тиллои Точик»
data.description: Президент Таджикистана Эмомали Рахмон 28 мая своими указами и постановлениями произвел кадровые перестановки в сферах образования, сельского хозяйства, государственных закупок и других. В частности, в стране сменились руководители ряда вузов, комплекса «Кохи Борбад», предприятия «Тиллои Точик».
data.translatedTitle: Emomali Rahmon replaced rectors of a number of universities, leaders of Kochi Borbad and Tilloi Toshik
data.translatedDescription: On May 28, President of Tajikistan Emomali Rahmon on May 28 with his decrees and decisions made personnel permits in the fields of education, agriculture, public procurement and others. In particular, the country has changed the leaders of a number of universities, the Kochi Borbad complex, and Tilloi Toshik enterprises.

data.title: В Таджикистане увеличат численность налоговиков
data.description: Предельная численность работников Налогового комитета при правительстве Таджикистана увеличена с 1843 до 1903. Соответствующие изменения внесены в постановление «О Налоговом комитете при правительстве РТ» от 31 августа 2012 года.
data.translatedTitle: Tajikistan will increase the number of tax authorities
data.translatedDescription: The maximum number of employees of the tax committee under the Government of Tajikistan was increased from 1843 to 1903. The corresponding changes were made to the resolution “On the Tax Committee under the Government of the Republic of Tatarstan” of August 31, 2012.

data.title: Салом алейкум, Таджикистан! Анонсы событий, день в истории, прогноз погоды на 29 мая 2025 года
data.description: АНОНСЫ СОБЫТИЙ НА 29 МАЯ    - В Душанбе начинает работу  Международная конференция высокого уровня по сохранению ледников . В конференции примут участие более 2200 представителей из 65 стран и 70 международных организаций. Организаторы конференции надеются, что ее результаты станут началом новых международных инициатив в области защиты ледников и борьбы с климатическими угрозами.
data.translatedTitle: Salom Aleikum, Tajikistan! Events announcements, day in history, weather forecast for May 29, 2025
data.translatedDescription: Announcements of events for May 29 - an international high -level conference on the preservation of glaciers begins work in Dushanbe. The conference will be attended by more than 2200 representatives of 65 countries and 70 international organizations. The conference organizers hope that its results will be the beginning of new international initiatives in the field of protection of glaciers and the fight against climatic threats.

data.title: Субҳ ба хайр, Тоҷикистон! Як рӯз дар таърих, зодрӯзи шахсиятҳо, вазъи ҳаво барои 29 майи соли 2025
data.description: ЧОРАБИНИҲОИ 29 МАЙ    - Имрӯз дар шаҳри Душанбе Конфронси байналмилалии ҳифзи пиряхҳо оғоз мегардад. Дар ин конфронс беш аз 2200 намоянда аз 65 кишвар ва 70 созмони байналмилалӣ иштирок мекунанд. Созмондиҳандагони конфронс умедворанд, ки натиҷаҳои он оғози ташаббусҳои нави байналмилалӣ дар соҳаи ҳифзи пиряхҳо ва мубориза бо таҳдидҳои иқлимӣ хоҳад шуд.

data.title: DSP o Maquiavélico Ganancioso
data.description: Guineenses, mais uma vez, venho para vos alertar sobre o perigo que Domingos Simões Pereira representa para a Guiné-Bissau. Faço esse alerta a todos os guineenses sem exceção que se encontre no país ou no estrangeiro, ao PAIGC em especial e na pessoa do Cipriano Cassamá em concreto. Alerta esse sobre o verdadeiro DSP, o verdadeiro espírito que move esse sujeito, o qual alguns ainda continuam a acreditar para não dizer adorar. Domingos Simões Pereira é um manipulador, um verdadeiro chantagista e calculista provavelmente, tipo de comportamento que ultrapassa o nível de psicopata. U m ambicioso desmedido, um verdadeiro criminoso que sabe como e quando cometer o crime. Ele jamais coabitaria não só com JOMAV, assim como com qualquer presidente que seria eleito, a não ser o que ele apoiou disfarçadamente. Isto porque ele tem sua própria agenda, e o PAIGC é simplesmente uma plataforma para sua concretização. DSP jamais coabitaria com JOMAV porque o seu candidato preferido era o Paulo Gomes e sempre será, o qual juntamente com Tchitchi vão delineando mecanismo de modo a serem os novos donos da Guiné-Bissau. Segundo eles este é um processo a médio prazo, e é preciso coragem e paciência para concretiza-lo. Ganhar o congresso não importa em que circunstância e ter novamente o partido na mão, é uma fase concluída em proveito deles, enquanto verdadeiros militantes do PAIGC estão a bater palmas. Depois dessa eleição legislativa, não importa o resultado, o Cipriano Cassama que se prepare a mala ou fica de bico fechado, pois o candidato preferido para o partido será o Paulo Gomes, e esse sim deve ter a voz dentro do partido. DSP é um ambicioso desmedido, nunca teve consideração por ninguém, JOMAV muito menos, o sujeito é um maquiavélico nato, Cipriano Casama será descartado quando menos esperar podes tomar a nota. Guineenses, falar do Paulo Gomes e Tchitchi é falar do MCCI e demais outras organizações e personalidades camufladas no nosso país. Esses dois indivíduos são os principais financiadores do MCCI e demais outras personalidades boca de aluguel na cidade de Bissau. O MCCI, Milícia idealizado por JBV e DSP, agora financiado e dirigido por "futuro triângulo do poder" ou seja, "DSP, Paulo Gomes e Tchitchi", têm 3 principais objectivos: 1º Perturbar a ordem pública em nome da cidadania, difamar e tentar descredibilizar qualquer que seja organizações ou indivíduos não alinhados ao triângulo, de modo a suportar suas caminhadas na busca do poder. 2º Caso se concretize o objectivo do triângulo, o papel da Milícia do MCCI passará a ser de vigilância constante a todos os adversários de modo a garantir falsa paz social e o poder de controlo. 3º Tentar ganhar credibilidade junto das organizações internacionais e regionais, através de suas visitas e actividades de fachada, para quando houver as tais actividades de perturbações de ordem pública, poderem ganhar notoriedade. Mas isso não deve preocupar ninguém, pois estão bem identificados e bem caçados, dentro e fora da Guiné-Bissau. Não tenho nada contra ninguém, mas quem continuar a perturbar verdadeira paz social dos guineenses em troca de benefícios como sempre foi nos últimos anos dessa crise, e que sempre tenho tolerado, então que fique claro "estou firme e determinado para tudo e todos". Para finalizar, gostaria de vos deixar uma reflexão com a seguinte frase: " Domingos Simões Pereira é um perigo grave para o futuro do país ". Isto porque publicar aqui tudo que é necessário para provar ou sustentar a razão dessa frase, só pode agravar ainda mais a paz social que tanto necessitamos. Chega, chega não podemos continuar a viver nessa turbulência vida toda, meus irmãos guineenses, não é saudável, é tóxico, não é justo para um povo que tanto sofreu. António Aly Silva » aaly.silva@gmail.com » aaly_silva@hotmail.com » Tel. (+245) 668 31 13
data.translatedTitle: DSP The greedy Machiavellian
data.translatedDescription: Guineans, once again, come to alert you to the danger that Domingos Simões Pereira represents to Guinea-Bissau. I make this alert to all Guineans without exception that you are in the country or abroad, to the PAIGC in particular and the person of Cyprian Cassamá in concrete. Warns this about the true DSP, the true spirit that moves this subject, which some still continue to believe not to say to worship. Domingos Simões Pereira is a manipulator, a real blackmailer and calculator, probably, kind of behavior that goes beyond the psychopath level. An ambitious excessive, a true criminal who knows how and when to commit the crime. He would never cohabble not only with Jomav, as well as with any president who would be elected, except what he supported undercover. This is because it has its own agenda, and PAIGC is simply a platform for its realization. DSP would never cohabble with Jomav because his favorite candidate was Paulo Gomes and always will be, who together with Tchitchi are outlining mechanism so that they are the new owners of Guinea-Bissau. According to them this is a process in the medium term, and it takes courage and patience to realize it. Winning Congress does not matter under what circumstances and have the party again in hand, it is a phase completed for them, while true PAIGC militants are clapping. After this legislative election, no matter the result, Cipriano Cassama who prepares the suitcase or is closed, because the favorite candidate for the party will be Paulo Gomes, and this must have his voice inside the party. DSP is an ambitious excessive, never considered by anyone, much less Jomav, the subject is a born Machiavellian, Cyprian Casama will be discarded when least expecting you can take the note. Guineans, talking about Paulo Gomes and Tchitchi is talking about MCCI and other other camouflaged organizations and personalities in our country. These two individuals are MCCI's main funders and other other rental mouths in the city of Bissau. The MCCI, a militia designed by JBV and DSP, now funded and directed by "future triangle of power" ie "DSP, Paulo Gomes and Tchitchi", have 3 main objectives: 1st disrupting public order in the name of citizenship, defaming and trying to disbelief whatever organizations or individuals not aligned with the triangle in order to support their walks in the search for power. 2º If the objective of the triangle is realized, the role of the MCCI militia will become constant surveillance to all opponents to ensure false social peace and the power of control. 3º Try to gain credibility with international and regional organizations, through their visits and facade activities, so when there are such public order disturbance activities, they can gain notoriety. But this should not worry anyone, as they are well identified and well hunted, inside and outside Guinea-Bissau. I have nothing against anyone, but those who continue to disturb true social peace of the Guineans in exchange for benefits as always has been in the last years of this crisis, and that I have always tolerated, so that it is clear "I am firm and determined for everything and everyone." Finally, I would like to leave you a reflection with the following sentence: "Domingos Simões Pereira is a serious danger to the country's future." This is because publishing here everything that is necessary to prove or support the reason for this sentence, can only further aggravate the social peace we need so much. Enough, enough we can not continue to live in this turbulence all life, my Guinean brothers, is not healthy, it is toxic, not fair to a people who suffered so much. data.description:
DSP através da sua equipa de "Lambe-Botas" está cavando cada vez mais a sua própria cova, adiantando cada vez mais o seu fim. Somente alguns acreditavam que foi ele quem estava por trás do "Progresso Nacional" o blog onde começou toda essa história de Mentiras, Calunias, Difamações, Ameaças e tantos outros agressões tóxicas ao espírito humano, a todos os que não estão do seu lado e cujo o único objectivo, era ser chamado de rei dos réis da Guiné. Comandou o Progresso Nacional assim como Bin Laden comandou a Al-Qaeda e acabou por fracassar. Pensou, repensou e resolveu voltar novamente ainda com mais TERROR e está a comandar o Guiné Puro tentando levar toda a nação ao abismo assim como o ISIS quer levar a humanidade. Camaradas, Guiné Puro assim como o falecido Progresso Nacional é o reflexo do espirito de DSP, alí é possivel ver tudo e quanto o sujeito é baixo. DSP é um hipócrita e um anarquista moderno. "ACHAS QUE AS NOSSAS MARCHAS SÃO RESULTADO DE VENDAS E COMPRAS?!" essa foi uma das frases da recente publicação que mostram por quem e para que fim, é dirigido o Guiné Puro ou melhor o blog do terror como podem ver já a seguir. Demonstraram mais uma vez claramente que o "MCCI" pertence a DPS, pois uma publicação dessa no próprio blog do ganancioso só pode ser das duas uma: "Boca capli elis ou Foronta passanta e dicidi ca sucundi rostu". Camaradas, Domingos Simões Pereira afundou seu próprio barco devido a sua ganância e complexo de superioridade. "I pirigu pa i faladu ba cuma, el i unicu alguim cu bai escola na Guiné" seu ultimo desejo é "afundar com todos, inclusive o PAIGC". __________PARA A VOSSA CONFIRMAÇÃO, AQUI ESTÁ A PUBLICAÇÃO_________ MARCOS GALINA BARBOSA VAI PERCEBER QUE METEU COM GENTE

data.title: DSP, UM PERIGO GRAVE PARA FUTURO DO PAÍS
data.description: Os meios de comunicação também são as formas de manipulação mais utilizadas pelos poderes políticos, dado o seu impacto social. As informações são manipuladas não apenas tendo em vista omitir factos relevantes, mas também distorcer o conteúdo da informação veiculada, produzir ou forjar a opinião pública, de modo que a mesma se ajuste às ideias dos gananciosos. A única forma dos cidadãos evitarem cair nestes processos de manipulação é tornarem-se mais vigilantes em relação às instituições democráticas e aos órgãos de informação, adoptando uma atitude de permanente reflexão crítica sobre a informação que lhes é fornecida. Na Guiné-Bissau, nos últimos anos, cresceu exponencialmente o número de pessoas mediocres, pessoas sem escrúpulos ligadas à produção de rádios e outros meios de comunicação com influencia na nossa sociedade, gente que apesar da sua enorme influência na sociedade, trabalha na mais completa impunidade e sem qualquer controlo ético/democrático. Obcecado pelo poder, ciente da dificuldade do povo guineense em avaliar informações, ciente do poder dos instrumentos de comunicação, Domingos Simões Pereira (DSP) nunca menosprezou esses instrumentos para atingir seu objectivo, sempre usou-os de forma desonesta como agora está a fazer tudo por tudo para manter no controlo desses veicúlos, mesmo que isso custe a vida dos outros. Governou na corrupção, no nepotismo e no desvios de somas astronómicas do dinheiro de povo, que muito serviria para investimentos na saúde, educação e outros serviços publicos, para beneficiar familiares e amigos. Finge que preocupa com os problemas do país, mas só engana o povo honesto, humilde e trabalhador que infelizmente sofre muito, não sei até quando, devido a sua paciência e tolerância aos governantes como DSP, criminoso travestido em politico que vive na custa de povo e acima de tudo ainda fa-lo refem do próprio suor. Roubou e decepcionou tanto não só aos guineenses assim como a comunidade internacional que sempre acreditou que o sujeito era ideal para ajudar esse povo a sair do ciclo de sofrimento que parece infinito. Foi demitido, não conformou e está a fazer tudo na medida do possível para continuar a complicar a vida dos guineenses. Razão disso é que depois de perder a batalha nos meios de comunicações mais modernos nomeadamente os blogues onde investiu grandes somas do dinheiro de povo, para fazer a lavagem cerebral dos menos instruídos e não só. Fugiu do facebook onde sempre frequentava e comunicava com todos tentado passar a mensagem de um politico moderno e aberto a diálogo/opiniões, mas que afinal era simplesmente um falso modernista. Caiu a mascara e já não consegue enganar ninguem, pois a sua credibilidade está abaixo de zero, para não dizer outra coisa. Camaradas, para conhecimento geral, com o dinheiro roubado que custou suor de povo guineense, DSP decidiu avançar com um outro novo plano maquiavelico, para criar a sua própria estação de rádio. Documento António Aly Silva » aaly.silva@gmail.com » aaly_silva@hotmail.com » Tel. (+245) 668 31 13
data.translatedTitle: DSP, a serious danger to the country's future
data.translatedDescription: The media are also the most used forms of manipulation by political powers, given their social impact. The information is manipulated not only in view of omitting relevant facts, but also distorting the content of the information conveyed, producing or forging public opinion, so that it adjusts to the ideas of the greedy. The only way for citizens to avoid falling into these manipulation processes is to become more vigilant in relation to democratic institutions and information bodies, adopting an attitude of permanent critical reflection on the information provided to them. In Guinea-Bissau, in recent years, the number of mediocre people has grown exponentially, unscrupulous people linked to the production of radios and other media with influence on our society, people who despite their enormous influence on society, work on more complete impunity and without any ethical/democratic control. Obsessed with power, aware of the difficulty of the Guinean people in evaluating information, aware of the power of communication instruments, Domingos Simões Pereira (DSP) has never belittled these instruments to achieve their goal, always used them dishonestly how it is now doing everything to keep in control of these vehicles, even if it costs the lives of others. He ruled in corruption, nepotism and deviations from astronomical sums of people's money, which would serve much for investments in health, education and other public services, to benefit family and friends. It pretends to worry about the problems of the country, but only deceives the honest, humble and worker people who are unfortunately suffering a lot, I don't know how long, due to their patience and tolerance to rulers like DSP, a politician-crossed criminal who lives at the expense of people and above all they still do so. He stole and disappointed so much not only to the Guineans as well as the international community that always believed that the subject was ideal to help these people get out of the suffering cycle that seems infinite. He was fired, did not conform and is doing everything as far as possible to continue to complicate the life of the Guineans. Reason for this is that after losing the battle in the most modern media, namely the blogs where it invested great sums of people's money, to make the brainwash of the less educated and beyond. He ran away from Facebook where he always attended and communicated with everyone attempted to give the message of a modern politician and open to dialogue/opinions, but after all he was simply a false modernist. The mask fell and can no longer fool anyone, because its credibility is below zero, not to say something else. Comrades, for general knowledge, with the stolen money that cost Guinean people sweat, DSP decided to advance with another new Machiavellian plan, to create his own radio station. data.title: Producir o procrear: penalizaciones por maternidad en la actividad científica en Uruguay
data.description: La subrepresentación de las mujeres en los niveles más altos de liderazgo académico y científico no sólo refleja una desigualdad persistente, sino que también empobrece el sistema de ciencia y tecnología. Fomentar una mayor pluralidad y diversidad contribuye significativamente a mejorar su desempeño, potenciar la creatividad y la innovación, y ampliar el impacto positivo del conocimiento en la sociedad. En las últimas semanas ha resurgido el debate sobre la escasa representación de mujeres entre las candidaturas a los cargos de mayor jerarquía, desde las intendencias departamentales hasta el rectorado de la Universidad de la República (Udelar). La participación femenina en posiciones de liderazgo continúa siendo un tema central en la agenda de la igualdad y es una preocupación que cobra especial ... Continuar leyendo...
data.translatedTitle: Produce or procreate: maternity penalizations in scientific activity in Uruguay
data.translatedDescription: The sub -presentation of women at the highest levels of academic and scientific leadership not only reflects persistent inequality, but also impoverishes the science and technology system. Promoting greater plurality and diversity contributes significantly to improve its performance, enhance creativity and innovation, and expand the positive impact of knowledge on society. In recent weeks, the debate on the low representation of women has resurfaced among the candidacies to the positions of greater hierarchy, from the departmental intendencies to the rector of the University of the Republic (Udelar).
